name: JavapJsonOutput
description: java program like javap which prints output in json. Uses node small cli.
author: Sebastian Gurin

scripts.java-test1: npm run java-build && java -cp java-lib/commons-lang3-3.4.jar -cp java-src JavapJsonOutput java.lang.String,java.util.List
scripts.java-test2: npm run java-build && java -cp java-lib/commons-lang3-3.4.jar -cp java-src JavapJsonOutput org.apache.lucene.store.RAMDirectory ../node-lucene/lucene-lib/lucene-core-7.4.0.jar
